ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 4000pp!?!!   what the hell am I doing wrong....  I m like 22nd level now and everything I own, including spells and some dabbling with trade skills,
ygData.messageBody:
>Can be done and has been done in the past, without use of exploits.
>Aosinator had amassed almost 4000pp by the time she was level 15, and it
>was by using her proceeds in an intelligent manner. Don't point the
>accusatory finger at someone until ye know all the facts.

4000pp!?!! what the hell am I doing wrong.... I'm like 22nd level now
and everything I own, including spells and some dabbling with trade skills,
MAYBE.. and I'm broke!

If I may ask, was this from fighting/looting or from a trade skill of some
sort, or just a good head for buisness?

Cal
